analyzer.title: DMX File Analyzer

match.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'{dbOwner}[{objQualifier}DMX_Entries]') AND type in (N'U')) SELECT 1 ELSE SELECT 0

analyzer.sql-docs: SELECT e.EntryId as Id, e.Owner as AuthorId, l.LastModified, e.Title, 'DMX/' + e.Entry as RelativePath, (CASE WHEN e.Deleted = 1 OR e.EntryId != e.LastVersionId THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as IsDeleted, (CASE WHEN e.EntryType = 'File.Adobe.Acrobat' THEN 'pdf' WHEN e.EntryType = 'File.Microsoft.Word' THEN 'doc' WHEN e.EntryType = 'File.Microsoft.WordX' THEN 'docx' -- more extensions here END) as FileType FROM {dbOwner}[{objQualifier}DMX_Entries] e INNER JOIN {dbOwner}[{objQualifier}DMX_Entries] l ON e.LastVersionId = l.EntryId WHERE e.IsApproved = 1 AND e.PortalId = {PortalId} and l.LastModified > {LastIndexTime}
analyzer.sql-permissions-roles: SELECT (CASE WHEN ep.RoleId >= 0 then r.RoleName WHEN ep.RoleId = -1 then 'All Users' WHEN ep.RoleID = -3 then 'Unauthenticated Users' END) as RoleName FROM {dbOwner}[{objQualifier}DMX_EntryPermissions] ep inner join {dbOwner}[{objQualifier}DMX_Permissions] p on ep.PermissionId = p.PermissionId and p.PermissionKey='VIEW' left join {dbOwner}[{objQualifier}Roles] r on ep.RoleId = r.RoleID WHERE EntryId = {Id}
